00059 uio::uio(QoccHarnessWindow* window) {
00060 
00061   windowPtr = window;
00062   viewPtr = window->getView();
00063   contextPtr = window->getContext();
00064   occPtr = window->getOCC();
00065   vcPtr = window->getVC();
00066   mbPtr = window->menuBar();
00067   hmPtr = window->getHelpMenu();
00068 
00069   initUI();
00070 }
00071 
00072 void uio::initUI() {
00073 
00074   slotNeutralSelection();
00075 
00076   QMenu *selectMenu;
00077   selectMenu = new QMenu("&Select");
00078   mbPtr->insertMenu(hmPtr,selectMenu);  //put this menu BEFORE the help menu
00079   //    mbPtr->addMenu(selectMenu);
00080 
00081   QAction *selectNeutralAction;
00082   selectNeutralAction = new QAction("Neutral", this);
00083   //selectNeutralAction->setShortcut(QString("Ctrl+N"));
00084   selectNeutralAction->setStatusTip("Select Nothing");
00085   connect(selectNeutralAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(slotNeutralSelection()));
00086   selectMenu->addAction( selectNeutralAction );
00087 
00088   QAction *selectVertexAction;
00089   selectVertexAction = new QAction("Vertex", this);
00090   selectVertexAction->setStatusTip("Select Vertices");
00091   connect(selectVertexAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(slotVertexSelection()));
00092   selectMenu->addAction( selectVertexAction );
00093 
00094   QAction *selectEdgeAction;
00095   selectEdgeAction = new QAction("Edge", this);
00096   selectEdgeAction->setStatusTip("Select Edges");
00097   connect(selectEdgeAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(slotEdgeSelection()));
00098   selectMenu->addAction( selectEdgeAction );
00099 
00100   QAction *selectFaceAction;
00101   selectFaceAction = new QAction("Face", this);
00102   selectFaceAction->setStatusTip("Select Faces");
00103   connect(selectFaceAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(slotFaceSelection()));
00104   selectMenu->addAction( selectFaceAction );
00105 
00106   QAction *selectSolidAction;
00107   selectSolidAction = new QAction("Solid", this);
00108   selectSolidAction->setStatusTip("Select Solids");
00109   connect(selectSolidAction, SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(slotSolidSelection()));
00110   selectMenu->addAction( selectSolidAction );
00111 
00112 }

00117 
00118 void uio::getSelection() {
00119   selectedShapes.clear();
00120   for ( contextPtr->InitSelected(); contextPtr->MoreSelected(); contextPtr->NextSelected() ) {
00121     Handle_AIS_InteractiveObject IO = contextPtr->Interactive();
00122     if ( !contextPtr->HasSelectedShape() )
00123     {
00124       infoMsg("no selection");
00125       //                        contextPtr->ClearSelected();
00126       //                        break;
00127     }
00128     if ( IO->IsKind(STANDARD_TYPE(AIS_Trihedron)) )
00129     {
00130       //we don't want to save the trihedron
00131       //clearSelected apparently clears EVERYTHING, rather than deselecting one thing...
00132       continue;
00133     }
00134     selectedShapes.push_back(contextPtr->SelectedShape());
00135   }
00136   cout << "selectedShapes.size(): " << selectedShapes.size() << endl;
00137 }

00145 //normally called like this: debugMsg("error string",__FILE__,__LINE__);
00146 void uio::debugMsg(std::string s, std::string f, int l) {
00147   errors++;
00148   cerr << "Error  #" << errors << ": " << s << "\n\tin file " << f << " at line " << l << "." << endl;
00149 }

00152 void uio::infoMsg( std::string title, std::string message ) {
00153   QMessageBox::information(windowPtr,title.c_str(),message.c_str());
00154 }

00156 void uio::infoMsg( std::string message ) {
00157   QMessageBox::information(windowPtr,"Cam-occ2",message.c_str());
00158 }

00183 std::string uio::toString(double a,double b, double c) {
00184   std::ostringstream os;
00185   os << a << ", " << b << ", " << c;
00186   return os.str();
00187 }
00188 
00189 std::string uio::toString(gp_Pnt p) {
00190   return toString(p.X(),p.Y(),p.Z());
00191 }
00192 
00193 std::string uio::toString(gp_Dir d) {
00194   std::string str;
00195   Standard_Real angTol = 0.000175;      //approx .01 degrees
00196   if(d.IsParallel( gp_Dir(0,0,1), angTol ) ){
00197     str = "Z axis";
00198   } else if (d.IsParallel( gp_Dir(0,1,0), angTol ) ) {
00199     str = "Y axis";
00200   } else if (d.IsParallel( gp_Dir(1,0,0), angTol ) ) {
00201     str = "X axis";
00202   } else {
00203     if (d.IsNormal( gp_Dir(0,0,1), angTol ) ) {
00204       str = "horizontal, ";
00205     }
00206     str += "(" + toString(d.X(),d.Y(),d.Z()) + ")";
00207   }
00208   return str;
00209 }
00210 
00211 void uio::checkShapeType(TopoDS_Shape Shape)
00212 {
00213   std::string str;
00214   if (Shape.IsNull()) {
00215     str = "null";
00216   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_EDGE) {
00217     str = "edge";
00218   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_FACE) {
00219     str = "face";
00220   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_WIRE) {
00221     str = "wire";
00222   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_SHAPE) {
00223     str = "shape";
00224   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_COMPOUND) {
00225     str = "compound";
00226   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_COMPSOLID) {
00227     str = "compsolid";
00228   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_SOLID) {
00229     str = "solid";
00230   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_SHELL) {
00231     str = "shell";
00232   } else if (Shape.ShapeType()==TopAbs_VERTEX) {
00233     str = "vertex";
00234   } else {
00235     str = "borked";
00236   }
00237   infoMsg("The shape is: " + str + ".");
00238 }

00240 void uio::slotNeutralSelection()
00241 {
00242   contextPtr->CloseAllContexts();
00243 }
00244 
00245 void uio::slotVertexSelection()
00246 {
00247   contextPtr->CloseAllContexts();
00248   contextPtr->OpenLocalContext();
00249   contextPtr->ActivateStandardMode(TopAbs_VERTEX);
00250 }

00255   contextPtr->OpenLocalContext();
00256   contextPtr->ActivateStandardMode(TopAbs_EDGE);
00257 }

00291 void uio::sleep(uint n, bool usrEv) {
00292   QTime dieTime = QTime::currentTime().addSecs(n);
00293   while( QTime::currentTime() < dieTime ) {
00294     if (usrEv) {
00295       QCoreApplication::processEvents(QEventLoop::AllEvents, 100);
00296     } else {
00297       QCoreApplication::processEvents(QEventLoop::ExcludeUserInputEvents, 100);
00298     }
00299   }
00300   return;
00301 }
